languages.text: {n}Сенешаль стряхивает несколько невидимых пылинок с кителя.{/n} "Что-то еще, Лорд-капитан?"
{n}Abelard brushes an invisible piece of lint from his coat.{/n} "Was there something else, Lord Captain?"
languages.original_text: {n}Сенешаль стряхивает несколько невидимых пылинок с кителя.{/n} "Что-то еще, Лорд-капитан?"

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德从外套上拍落了一团看不见的绒毛。{/n}“还有什么别的事情吗，舰长大人？”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard brushes an invisible piece of lint from his coat.{/n} "Was there something else, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德从外套上拍落了一团看不见的绒毛。{/n}“还有什么别的事情吗，舰长大人？”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Abelard brushes an invisible piece of lint from his coat.{/n} "Was there something else, Lord Captain?"

languages.text: {n}Abelard se quita una pelusa invisible del abrigo.{/n} «¿Quería algo más, Lord Capitán?».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard brushes an invisible piece of lint from his coat.{/n} "Was there something else, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard se quita una pelusa invisible del abrigo.{/n} «¿Quería algo más, Lord Capitán?».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドはコートについていた糸くずを払った。{/n}「他に何かございますでしょうか、ロード・キャプテン？」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard brushes an invisible piece of lint from his coat.{/n} "Was there something else, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドはコートについていた糸くずを払った。{/n}「他に何かございますでしょうか、ロード・キャプテン？」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard wischt sich unsichtbaren Staub vom Mantel.{/n} "War sonst noch etwas, Lord Captain?"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard brushes an invisible piece of lint from his coat.{/n} "Was there something else, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard wischt sich unsichtbaren Staub vom Mantel.{/n} "War sonst noch etwas, Lord Captain?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard époussette machinalement son manteau.{/n} « Y a-t-il autre chose que vous souhaitez me demander, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard brushes an invisible piece of lint from his coat.{/n} "Was there something else, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard époussette machinalement son manteau.{/n} « Y a-t-il autre chose que vous souhaitez me demander, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, ceketinin üstünde zorlukla görülen bir tiftiği eliyle süpürüyor.{/n} "Başka bir isteğiniz var mıydı Lord Kaptan?"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard brushes an invisible piece of lint from his coat.{/n} "Was there something else, Lord Captain?"
